    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        public void invoke(Project project,
                   Editor editor,
                   PsiFile file,
                   DataContext dataContext)
        Description copied from interface: RefactoringActionHandler
        Invokes refactoring action from editor. The refactoring obtains all data from editor selection.
        Specified by:
        invoke in interface RefactoringActionHandler
        Overrides:
        invoke in class IntroduceVariableBase
        Parameters:
        project - the project in which the refactoring is invoked.
        editor - editor that refactoring is invoked in
        file - file should correspond to editor
        dataContext - can be null for some but not all of refactoring action handlers (it is recommended to pass DataManager.getDataContext() instead of null)
